phrs.translation: 古灵侦探, 装上羽毛, 弗莱彻, 杀人方程式
古灵侦探, 侦探的胜利

sentences.sentence: Oh, Fletch, you don't love that!
sentences.translation: 噢，弗莱契，你爱的当然不是那个！

sentences.sentence: You can see how much it meant to Fletch to score.
sentences.translation: 你可以看到柴帝进球的意义。

sentences.sentence: I only have to feed it water and food every 24 hours. It plays fletch with me.
sentences.translation: 我只要每隔24小时喂它一次水，并且喂它一次食物就可以了。
